mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_POST_REPORT ( ID, POST_REPORT_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID, POST_ID, POST_REPORT_CREATE_AT ) VALUES ( SEQ_POST_REPORT.NEXTVAL, #{postReportContent}, #{memberId}, #{postId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT p.ID AS postId, p.POST_TITLE AS postTitle, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS writerNickname, COUNT(r.ID) AS reportCount, MAX(r.POST_REPORT_CREATE_AT) AS lastReportAt FROM TBL_POST_REPORT r JOIN TBL_POST p ON r.POST_ID = p.ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON p.MEMBER_ID = m.ID GROUP BY p.ID, p.POST_TITLE, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME ORDER BY lastReportAt DESC
